DOC.brief_summary: This study is a local PCO sponsored, interventional, non-drug study to evaluate the efficacy of a health tele-counselling program in reducing cardiovascular risk in dyslipidemic patients.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy of a Counselling and Advisory Care for Health (COACH) Program in Dyslipidemic Patients.
DOC.criteria: 1. Subjects who are newly diagnosed with dyslipidemias. 2. Subjects must be lipid drug naive and eligible for statin therapy. 1. Subjects who cannot be contacted by telephone or handphone. 2. Subjects with uncontrolled primary hypothyroidism.
